summary: A true story of a young woman whose abusive childhood results in her developing a multiple personality disorder.
cast: Jessica Lange|Tammy Blanchard|Ron White|JoBeth Williams|Alison Murray|Fab Filippo|Brian Downey|Brianna MacDonald|Joey Campbell|David Patrick Flemming|Michael Ray Fox|Gary Levert|David Wm. Marsh|Liam McNamara|Marlane O'Brien|Wanda Taylor
title: Sybil
